details.title: Snapshot-instantaneous ||. ||<sub>infin</sub> normalization against heavy-tail noise
details.abstract: A new data-dependent zero-memory preprocessing algorithm is proposed to mitigate additive heavy-tail noise and/or shot noise. Each sensor-array snapshot's spatial data vector is adaptively normalized by its infinity-norm. Zero cross-correlation is preserved between the signal-subspace and the noise-space.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
